EmailTemplate.name: Artwork to Graphic Design
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are sending your logo to our graphic design team to confirm the logo is in the correct format and the Pantone colors are provided; should they need anything they will let you know. If the format is correct, we will have a formal artwork proof for your approval in 1-2 weeks.
YETI graphic design team please see attached artwork for the following logo.
Logo Name:
Number of colors:
Pantone colors:
Thanks!
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
